name: The BIMBLEs -vs- the inevitable forces of tedium
name_original: The BIMBLEs -vs- the inevitable forces of tedium
description:
Woah-oh-oh rad-tacular teens, watch out! In our post-machine-war world, there is only the encroaching forces of inevitable adult life!

Join the BIMBLES, the baddest mutant bio-punk gang left, and race to beat the forces of tedium and fiscal responsibilties.

WIN RACES = STAY FREE

TRY FULLSCREEN IF USING WEB PLAYER

Controls:

W or UP to Accelerate

S or DOWN to Brake

A or LEFT for Left

D or RIGHT for Right
